entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Eskasoni

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Snow or rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
